name: Wizcacha
description:
Introduction

Welcome to Wizcacha, a 3D platformer where you play as an adventurous viscacha! The game was inspired by 3D platformers of the late 1990's and early 2000's.

The game has 3 unique levels, the player can enter these levels through a separate overworld screen.

The 4 abilities and the later levels in the game are unlocked by beating levels and progressing in the overworld.

The goal of the game is to complete levels by finding the exit points and reach the top of the mountain in the overworld.

The core gameplay consists of finding collectibles, defeating and/or dodging enemies and completing levels as fast as possible.

Gathering collectibles is entirely optional but encouraged!

Instructions

In the third level the player is meant to find two magic orbs in order to activate the mountain teleport in the middle of the level.

Once a level has been completed, a speedrun mode is unlocked for said level. This is activated by picking up a stopwatch at the start of the level.

The game has automatic saving that tracks found collectibles, level completion times, completed levels and unlocked abilities.

Wizcacha can be played with keyboard and mouse or with an Xbox 360 controller.

Credits

Juho Halttunen - animation implementation, code

Roni Kuikka - art, design

Diana Lindvall - 3D modeling, animation, art, design

Ville Mäyrälä - code

Arttu Rantala - code, design

Aleksi Virolainen - sound effects
